New Records: Kevin Pillar became the third player in AL/NL history to belt 300 home runs in a season
Key Match Events: Seiya Suzuki made a crucial error in the eighth inning, allowing two late runs to score in a 7-6 loss to the Braves
Kevin Pillar hit a sixth-inning leadoff homer
Ronald Acu√±a Jr. launched a two-run homer in the seventh
Pre-Game Insights: The Cubs were in a tight NL Wild Card race with five games remaining
Manager David Ross emphasized the importance of the team's resilience
Post-Match Reflections: Manager David Ross said that he was 'not going to highlight one mistake' and that Suzuki has been carrying the team offensively
Justin Steele said that the team has to dig deep and that they have five games left to bounce back
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cubs were eliminated from contention for the National League Central title, which was clinched by the Brewers
The Phillies clinched the top Wild Card seed, holding a five-game lead over Arizona
